summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6658 for the improvement of 21st Ave. S.W. from S.W. Alaska St. to approximately 600 feet northerly there of and from approximately 600 feet southerly of S.W. Genesee St. to S.w. Genesee St; and certain other avenues, streets and an easement; by constructing sanitary sewers together with the necessary appurtenances, and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance 104715 as amended by Ordinance No. 105811, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
